docs.snippet: A blustery storm, a touch of melancholy and a sense of pride converged at the closing ceremony of the 2016 Olympics on Sunday as Brazil breathed a collective sigh of relief at having pulled off South America's first Games....

docs.snippet: Whether planned or unanticipated, indelible marks of 120 years of modern Olympic competition have been left on many host cities. Here are six worth exploring....

docs.abstract: Six cities that hosted Olympic Games over past 120 years, where structures of Games continue to offer worthwhile adventures for tourists, highlighted.

headline.main: With the Olympics Over, Six Former Host Cities Worth Visiting
headline.print_headline: Six Cities Stand Proudly After the Games

docs.snippet: Events like the Olympics and the Oscars are finding their way onto streaming platforms, and marketers are wondering how to reach those viewers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Events like the Olympics and the Oscars are finding their way onto streaming platforms, and marketers are wondering how to reach those viewers.
docs.abstract: Advertising column; marketers report more media buyers are adding live streaming to their promotional campaigns; NBC says out of 26.7 million watching their Olympics television broadcast nightly, 225,000 to 500,000 were watching online live streams; shift raises questions on emerging platform's effectiveness.

headline.main: Lessons From Rio, as Live Events Make the Leap to Streaming
headline.print_headline: Lessons From Rio, as Live Events Make the Leap to Streaming
